Exercicio_2a

a.) C1,6(321(4)) = X(2) 
321(4) = 111001(2) = 0 111001 = 110010(2)

b.) C1,8(B2(16)) = X(2) 
B2(16) = 10110010(2) = 0 10110010 = 01100100(2)

c.) C2,6(231(4)) = X(2) 
231(4) = 101101(2) = 0 101101 = 011010 + 1 = 011011(2)
  
d.) C2,10(146(8)) = X(2) 
146(8) = 001100110(2) = 0 0001100110 = 0011001100 + 1 = 0011001101(2)

e.) C2,8(6F(16)) = X(2) 
6F(16) = 01101111(2) = 0 01101111 = 11011110 + 1 = 11011111(2)
